title: The economic effects of being denied an abortion
description:
What are the economic consequences of being denied an abortion? In a recent study, an economist looked for the answer in a pile of credit data. And the results surprised even her.

The deadline to apply for an internship to Planet Money and The Indicator for fall through winter is extended to Sunday, July 17th. Come work with us! Go to npr.org/internships to apply.
